error.http: Error occurred while processing the request. Please contact administrator

notes.title: Notes
notes.deleteMessage: Your saved note will be deleted. This cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete note?

redirect.message: You will be directed to our classic DirectMyCare site. Your experience may be impacted by your device screen size.

shiftattestation.title: Sign Attestation
shiftattestation.message: I, the Individual Provider, certify that the Client was not in the hospital, facility, or incarcerated during the time reported. I certify that the time reported is a true and accurate representation of when services were performed, and all services performed were within the Client's Plan of Care. I understand that falsifying information is Medicaid Fraud.
